name: Tala
0:
”Alexa, turn on the bedroom light”
”Alexa, turn off the kitchen light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Download ‘Tala’ from the app store.
Pair and configure your devices to the ‘Tala’ app.
Download Amazon ‘Alexa’ app from the app store and configure.
Search ‘Tala’ in the Alexa skills and enable.
Follow the instructions to complete linking.
Now setup is complete, you can control your Tala smart products with voice using commands like:
”Alexa, turn on the bedroom light”
”Alexa, set light to 50%”
”Alexa, turn off the kitchen light”
